h:head.h:title: OSCE GNM _1st Year _ Collection of throat swab

select1.label: Ask client to sit erect in bed or chair facing nurse , acutely ill client may lie back against end with head of bed raised to 45 degree angle
Have swab in tube ready for use. nurse may wish to loosen top so swab can be easily removed

While collecting throat culture -Instruct patient to tilt head backwards for clients in bed , place pillow behind shoulder
-If pharynx not visualized , depress tongue with tongue with tongue blades and not inflamed areas of pharynx. Prepare 1/3 of tongue only
-Insert swab without touching lips, teeth , tongue and cheeks
-gently but quickly swab tonsillar area to side making contact with inflamed or purulent sites
-Carefully withdraw swab without striking oral structure .immediately place swab in culture
-Place top on tube
-Discard tongue depressor into trash
-Wash hands
-Securely attach properly , completed identification
-Send specimen immediately to laboratory or store in refrigerator
